cortex.datasets.basic.mnist module¶

MNIST dataset

class cortex.datasets.basic.mnist.MNIST(source=None, restrict_digits=None, mode='train', binarize=False, name='mnist', out_path=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: cortex.datasets.BasicDataset

MNIST dataset iterator.

get_data(source, mode)[source]¶

Fetch data from gzip pickle.

Parameters:
  • source (str) – path to source.
  • mode (str) – train, test, or valid.
save_images(x, imgfile, transpose=False, x_limit=None)[source]¶

Saves visualization.

Parameters:
  • x (numpy.array) – array to be visualized.
  • imgfile (str) – output file.
  • transpose (bool) – if True, then transpose images.
  • x_limit (bool) – limit montage to x samples in the x direction.

image to visualize.
